name: Pco pixelfly
tagline: Camera user interface for PCOs pixelfly.usb camera
body:
### About the camera
The camera is a 1392x1040 pixel 14bit CCD with high quantum efficiency. The [manual] provides a lot of information about the device and further details can be found under (link to come).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
